DESCRIPTION: Increase damage and #yBlock of a card by X.
Brittle cards #yExhaust when they are #yEmpowered above X and lose all #yEmpower.
Ephemeral cards #yExhaust when played and are #yEthereal [REMOVE_SPACE].
Deal damage displayed and heal equal to unblocked damage dealt.
Put a number of cards from your discard pile to your hand.
